General.Name: Silicon Power Computer & Communications
General.Description: Silicon Power Computer & Communications Inc. manufactures and sells flash memory cards, USB flash drives, portable hard and solid state drives, DRAM modules, and industrial-grade products for industrial and enterprise applications in Taiwan and internationally. The company also provides memory modules, external storage products, power banks, and accessories, as well as apple solutions. In addition, it offers industrial SSD products. Silicon Power Computer & Communications Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
